pullRequest.title: [Photos] Sync photos to FirebaseStorage using Workers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Towards #310
Things done:

Added Worker and WorkerManager for photo sync
Cleanup FirebaseStorageManager
Minor Timber/lambdas nits that came across

Tested manually on emulator:


Network available -> New observation (FROGS project) -> Save


Network unavailable -> New observation (FROGS project) -> Save -> Killed the app -> Enable network -> Reopen the app

commit.message: Move remote path generator to FirestoreStorageManager

nodes.bodyText: Sorry just noticing this now, but should this method return a Completable since it's async?
Fyi, files #408 to revisit allowing user to specific constraints for upload.

It would seem saving the bitmap to local storage is out of scope of the viewmodel's responsibilities. Ideally both this and the access to the worker would be managed by the storageManager. Could these be moved there, or a TODO added to do so?

commit.message: Define API for remote storage manager
Make FirestoreStorageManager implementation of defined API

Cleanup

Move file save / enqueue to StorageManager

nodes.bodyText: In a future PR, it might make sense to fail against certain exceptions—not sure precisely what exceptions that function can throw, but I imagine there may be some cases that are unrecoverable, in which case it doesn't make sense to continue retry work.
Should we make this file extension a constant in the Config? Photo EXT or something like that?
